rules_text:
Reach, haste
At the beginning of each combat, you may pay {GW}{GW}. If you do, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, pillage, trample, and vigilance.
